sentences.en: Aha, you are an antique addict , aren't you?
sentences.cn: 啊, 那你是古董迷?

sentences.en: As the addict's tolerance increases, he requires ever larger doses of the drug.
sentences.cn: 嗜毒者由于对药物的耐受性增加了, 因而需要更大剂量的毒品.

sentences.en: Be a addict, the only thing you to do is crawl.
sentences.cn: 做为一只虫子, 我唯一需要做的事就是爬.爬,其实是最简单的.

sentences.en: Bruce , now twelve, revealed himself as a history addict.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯这时十二岁了, 喜欢历史就象着了魔.

sentences.en: Dr. Townsend was a drug addict.
sentences.cn: 汤森特医生是个嗜药成癖的瘾君子.

sentences.en: For one, it reduces the shame we have for being a love addict because it makes love addiction a legitimate form of mental illness like all addictions.
sentences.cn: 有一点，它使爱情上瘾和其他瘾症一样成为精神疾病的一种，这减少了当事人对于爱情不能自拔所感到的羞耻。

sentences.en: He is a drug addict who flaunts his addiction and refuses to get treatment.
sentences.cn: 他嗜药,并以此为荣甚至拒绝治疗.

sentences.en: He's only 24 years old and a drug addict.
sentences.cn: 他只有24岁，却是个瘾君子。

sentences.en: I always think about the web game Zhanshan - I must an addict!
sentences.cn: 我老在想着“战神”这个网络游戏 -- 我肯定是个“战神”迷了!

sentences.en: It's not easy for him to dry out since he has a lot of drug - addict friends.
sentences.cn: 他的毒瘾不易戒掉,因为他有很多朋友都是有毒瘾的人.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Walt's meth-business partner, the addict Jesse, is still recovering from the drug-related death of his girlfriend Jane at the end of last season.
sentences.cn: 而沃特的制毒搭档——瘾君子杰西还未从女朋友之死的痛苦中恢复过来。 他的女朋友简在上一季结尾时死于毒品。

sentences.en: My nephew is a complete video game addict.
sentences.cn: 我侄子绝对是个电子游戏迷。

sentences.en: Naylor acknowl-edged, in a letter to the judge, that he was a drug addict.
sentences.cn: 内勒在给法官的信中承认自己吸毒。

sentences.en: Not only am I an addict, I am also a pusher.
sentences.cn: 我不仅是个瘾君子, 还是个推动者.

sentences.en: She is a TV addict and watches as much as she can.
sentences.cn: 她是个电视迷，看起电视来没完没了。

sentences.en: That young man is a cocaine addict.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人吸食可卡因成瘾.

sentences.en: The self-confessed drug addict was arrested 13 months ago.
sentences.cn: 那个自己坦白的瘾君子在13个月前被逮捕。

sentences.en: What do gambling, sex, heroin and cocaine — and the other things that can addict us — have in common?
sentences.cn: 赌博、性爱、海洛因和可卡因以及其他能导致我们上瘾的事物，到底有什么共同点？

sentences.en: You go somewhere and you say, Hey, man, I'm a pot addict!
sentences.cn: 你可以去某个地方说, 嘿, 这个人, 我染上了毒瘾!
